mapper.select: SELECT s.* ,mo.id mo_id,mo.code mo_code,mo.project_id mo_project_id,mo.client_id mo_client_id,mo.status mo_status ,mo.receive_type mo_receive_type,mo.money_sum mo_money_sum,mo.point_sum mo_point_sum, mo.pay_type mo_pay_type,mo.pay_time mo_pay_time ,mo.cancel_time mo_cancel_time,mo.canceler mo_canceler,mo.receiver_name mo_receiver_name,mo.receiver_phone mo_receiver_phone,mo.receiver_address mo_receiver_address,mo.receiver_postcode mo_receiver_postcode,mo.create_time mo_create_time ,c.real_name clientName,c.tel clientPhone from sale_product_order_store s left join sale_product_order mo on s.order_id = mo.id left join client c on c.id = mo.client_id where s.id = #{id}

select d.*,attr.name attrName,product.name productName,product.portrait portrait from sale_product_order_detail d join sale_product_attr attr on attr.id = d.product_attr join sale_product product on product.id = attr.product_id where d.store_order_id = #{storeOrderId}
